== Use Cases == === GetCoverage === [[WCS-UC1.0|WCS Use Case 1.0]] - GetCoverage - Pre-built response.
* [[WCS GetCoverage Pre-built Response|Pre-built Response Document]] [[WCS-UC1.1|WCS Use Case 1.1]] - GetCoverage - Generated response.
[[WCS-UC1.2|WCS Use Case 1.2]] - GetCoverage - Generate response from aggregated data set.
[[WCS-UC1.3|WCS Use Case 1.3]] - GetCoverage - Aggregation and semantic inferencing.
=== DescribeCoverage === * [[WCS-UC2.0|WCS Use Case 2.0]] - DescribeCoverage - Pre-built response. ** [[WCS Data Model Mapping]] ** [[WCS Generating Range Fields ]] ** [[WCS DescribeCoverage Pre-built Response|Pre-built Response Document]] * [[WCS-UC2.1|WCS Use Case 2.1]] - DescribeCoverage - Generated response.
* [[WCS-UC2.2|WCS Use Case 2.2]] - DescribeCoverage - Generate response from aggregated data set.
* [[WCS-UC2.3|WCS Use Case 2.3]] - DescribeCoverage - Aggregation and semantic inferencing.
=== GetCapabilities === * [[WCS-UC3.0|WCS Use Case 3.0]] - GetCapabilities request with a pre-built response. ** [[WCS GetCapabilities Pre-built Response|Pre-built Response Document]] === Catalog Configuration === [[WCS-UC4.0|WCS Use Case 4.0]] - Catalog configuration for the WCS Server. ---- [[Use Case Template]] == [[WCS Data Model Mapping]] == ==[[DDX To RDF]] == == [[WCS Service Prototype]] == == [[ WCS Service version 1.1 ]] == ==[[Semantic Generation Of WCS Catalogs]]== ==[[2009 IPT Meeting]]== [[Category:WCS]]
